title: 2022 De Rosa TT03 Disk slips out faster, lighter, ultra-premium carbon time trial bike
content:
De Rosaâ€™s long-running, rim brake TT03 time trial bike gets a lighter, stiffer, and all-around faster disc brake update in the new TT03 Disk. The new disc brake version has been a bit of an open secret since its limited racing debut early this season with Cofidis starting at the Tour of Romandie. But now

The post 2022 De Rosa TT03 Disk slips out faster, lighter, ultra-premium carbon time trial bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
